meanings.sent1: She usually wakes up early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: People usually eat three meals a day.
meanings.sent3: The cat usually sleeps on the warm blanket.
meanings.sent4: The sun usually rises in the east.
meanings.sent5: The flowers usually bloom in spring.

meanings.sent1: He usually takes the bus to work.
meanings.sent2: It usually rains a lot in the rainy season.
meanings.sent3: The dog usually chases its tail for fun.
meanings.sent4: The wind usually blows gently through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The clock usually ticks loudly in the quiet room.
